question: I want to do a course on electrician in september at college? can u give me some dua or something that i can complete the course and be good at it ...
answer:
QUESTION
I want to do a course on electrician in september at college? can u give me some dua or something that i can complete the course and be good at it and get a degree in that so i can b a electrician, because my parents want me to get a good job so i can live my life properly.
ANSWER


Share:
The first and foremost aspect of success in anything is commitment, dedication and hard work. Together with that, make Du?aa to Allah Ta?ala to make that effort successful.

May Allah Ta?ala give you the strength to study hard and crown your efforts with success, Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
